field_description: Unique project identifier
flag to indicate whether a project was geocoded (1 indicates 'geocoded' and 0 indicates 'not geocoded')
Descriptive text string
the start date of the project in iso format (YYYY-MM-DD)
the type of project start (ex. Start-actual)
the end date of the project in iso format (YYYY-MM-DD)
the type of project end date ( ex. End-actual)
pipe delimited list of donors (ex: Name of Donor 1 | Name of Donor 2)
pipe delimited list of donors iso3 codes
pipe delimited list of recipients (ex: Name of recipient 1 | Name of recipient 2)
pipe delimited list of recipients iso3 codes
crosswalked sector codes ; crosswalked to AidData Sectors. Pipe delimited
crosswalked sector names ; crosswalked to AidData Sectors. Pipe delimited
crosswalked purpose codes ; crosswalked to AidData Purpose Codes. Pipe delimited
crosswalked purpose names ; crosswalked to AidData Purpose Names. Pipe delimited
status of the project, see documentation for code definitions
the earliest year associated with the project across start_actual_isodate and transaction_year attributes
the latest year associated with the project across end_actual_isodate and transaction_year attributes
sum of all committed dollars associated with the project ID from the transactions table
sum of all disbursed dollars associated with the project ID from the transactions table (this value is temporally relevant to the date of the dataset's most recent export)
Unique project identifier
unique project location identifier (project_id + '_' + geoname_id)
the precision code most representative of the location, see documentation for code definitions
the geoname id retrieved from http://geonames.org
the name of a place (from geonames)
latitude of a location in decimal degrees
longitude of a location in decimal degrees
one of the location type codes from http://www.geonames.org/export/codes.html
the location type name associated with the location type code
the hierarchical order of place, represented by geoname IDs, associated with the place name's geoname_id. Hierarchy is pipe delimited
the hierarchical order of place, represented by place names, associated with the place_name's geoname_id. Hierarchy is pipe delimited
the location class code most representative of the location, see documentation for code definitions
the geographic exactness code most representative of the location, see documentation for code definitions
a unique alphanumeric string for each transaction record
Unique project identifier
the date of the transaction in iso format (YYYY-MM-DD)
the year of the transaction (ex. 2007)
type of transaction (ex C=commitment, D=disbursement)
type of currency (ex. USD)
amount in currency of transaction (ex. 45000.00)
